solution_line_template: Pouring the {five_liter_bucket_capacity}-liter bucket into the {three_liter_bucket_capacity}-liter bucket leaves {five_liter_bucket_capacity}-{three_liter_bucket_capacity}={remainder_after_pouring_into_3l} liters, which go into the 6-liter bucket.

Then there are {six_liter_bucket_capacity}-{remainder_after_pouring_into_3l}=<<{six_liter_bucket_capacity}-{remainder_after_pouring_into_3l}={additional_capacity_6l_bucket}>>{additional_capacity_6l_bucket} liters that can be added.
